synopsis.text:
Along side his comrades, Rud, a warrior with an unparalleled defense stat of 9999, ventures into treacherous labyrinths as the indomitable tank of the Hero's Party. Driven by a personal quest to find a mythical wish-granting treasure to cure his cherished sister's illness, Rud's journey takes a dramatic turn when the ruthless hero expels him from the group, deeming his skills worthless.

Forced to return home, Rud encounters a young girl under attack by a monstrous foe. In a valiant act of chivalry, he saves her, and in gratitude, she unveils the hidden potential of his abilities with her rare appraisal skill. Armed with newfound knowledge of his extraordinary powers, Rud embarks on a fresh adventure as the strongest tank, determined to overcome any obstacle to save his sister and prove his true worth.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
